Ancestry-Goblin -- Female Unbreakable Goblin Fighter

Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)

Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Irongut Goblin: May safely eat spoiled food and when sickened
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command an Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn

Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
City Scavenger: +2 Subsist checks/May attempt +2 Society or Survival checks to Earn Income from using Subsist in a settlement
Junk Tinker: Can use Crafting on junk to create shoddy level 0 items and suffers no penalty when using them
Rough Rider: +1 Nature to Command An Animal with a goblin dog or wolf mount
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Very Sneaky: +5' Sneak and can Sneak between cover
Combat
Hit Points: 21 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Dogslicer (+8 1d6 S; dexterity; expert); Horsechopper (+5 1d8 S/P; strength; expert); Jaws (+8 1d6 P; dexterity; expert); Sawtooth Saber (+6 1d6 S; dexterity; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Goblin Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Dogslicer; Horsechopper; Goblin Weapons)
Goblin Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Dogslicer; Horsechopper)/Weapon Familiarity (Goblin Weapons)
Razortooth Goblin: Jaw attack inflicts 1d6 HP piercing
Skittering Scuttle: Has increased Goblin Scuttle effects
Unbreakable Goblin: +4 Hit Points
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Burn It!: Persistent fire damage from an attack inflicts +1 HP, and alchemical fire items inflict additional damage equal to 1/4 the item level
Goblin Scuttle: (R) Takes a Step or a 12' Stride when an ally moves to an adjacent position
Goblin Song: (1) R30' Successful Performance vs. Will DC of 1 target inflicts -1 Perception and Will for 1 rd, or for 1 min on a critical success
Goblin Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon goblin weapons
Goblin Weapon Frenzy: Critical hits with a goblin weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Point-Blank Shot: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 HP damage at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Very,Very Sneaky: Can Sneak at full Speed and without cover
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +3 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Charhide Goblin: Has fire resistance 1 and recovers from persistent fire damage with success on a DC 10 flat check, or on a DC 5 flat check with help
Irongut Goblin: +2 vs. conditions inflicted by ingestion, and successes on saves vs. ingestion conditions are critical successes
Snow Goblin: Has cold resistance 1 and treats environmental cold as 1 step less extreme
Unbreakable Goblin: Reduces falling damage by half the distance
Magic
Magic Notes: Burn It!: Fire spells inflict additional damage equal to half the spell level
Notes
Validation Errors:
Ancestry Feats Allocation: 1 available vs. 14 allocated
Cave Climber Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9

Goblin Weapon Expertise Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and goblin weapon familiarity feature (currently 1)
Goblin Weapon Frenzy Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5 and goblin weapon familiarity feature (currently 1)
Skittering Scuttle Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and goblin scuttle feature (currently 1)
Very,Very Sneaky Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and very sneaky feature (currently 1)
